messages.message: @Aayush can I set up some time with you to work through these issues? Most people don’t have these problems. With respect to the shared DB: I am really encouraging people to move away from that. There are a lot of cons to using a shared DB. If you really need it, I can show you how to configure it, but it will not be turned on by default for the ibdev-backend template.

Yes let's do that. Regarding shared DB, I completely agree - I've always used a local db previously (before crafting as well). But for search, it is essential to use a common DB because of all the setup steps/data indexing which are involved.

@Aayush for search, I use a local DB. I index a smaller data source and then use that to test the search front end and back end. If you really need to test a gigantic data source like the company Google Drive then the shared DB is necessary. Otherwise it’s not.
I can show you how to set that up too.
Anyway, feel free to schedule something on my calendar at a time that works for you!
